isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - CUMMINS ISM ENGINE - TROUBLESHOOTING - Cummins Electronic Service Tool

svcproc.title: Cummins Electronic Service Tool
svcproc.para: CM570 vehicles have a data link connected to the ATA data link connector (137). The Cummins electronic service tool can be used to program owner-specified information into the engine, monitor the system, and aid in troubleshooting the engine. Consult the Cummins ISM Troubleshooting and Repair Manuals. The Cummins electronic service tool may be available at the nearest Cummins Authorized Service Center.
